hero.title: Disciplined exposure for serious digital-asset teams.
hero.subtitle: CipherVault blends custody, quantitative research, and transparent reporting so every allocation is as resilient as a vault.
hero.pillCopy: Available for new clients through Q1.

stats.title: Our Achievements

desk.title: 24/7 Desk
desk.copy: Message advisors anytime for rebalancing help or treasury workflows.

faq.title: FAQ Library
faq.copy: Browse custody, staking, and on/off-ramp guidance in our docs.

blog.title: Blog + Research
blog.copy: Weekly on-chain insights and macro notes straight from the quant floor.

about.title: Security-first infrastructure with data-driven allocations.
about.lead: Every wallet is verified, every counterparty audited, and every rebalance recorded. Family offices, treasuries, and protocol foundations trust us to scale exposure without compromising governance.

checklist.custody: Custody partners meeting SOC 2 + insurance standards
checklist.quantResearch: Quant research spanning DeFi, RWA, and AI infrastructure
checklist.advisors: Dedicated advisors with institutional reporting cadences

mission.title: Unlock long-term financial growth with disciplined crypto exposure.

security.title: Security First
security.copy: Every asset is vetted for compliance, custody, and counterparty risk.

data.title: Data Driven
data.copy: Quant models, on-chain telemetry, and AI insights guide allocation.

transparent.title: Transparent
transparent.copy: Real-time dashboards, blockchain proofs, and monthly letters.

mobileApps.title: Invest on the go. Anywhere, anytime.
mobileApps.lead: Stay in touch with our app and desktop client.
